page.title: 20FARMING YEAR CONTINUED
page.content: baling is the next step. Barley straw is used for cattle fodder and wheat straw is used for bedding for calves and sheep. The stubble left in the fields is often burnt, though there is likely to be a change in the law allowing this. It may also be ploughed into the field, but it does not break down quickly so farmers do not like this. {AUTUMN.} Autumn is not so busy because farmers are getting ready for ploughing. This is the time of the year for putting up fencing and spreading more manure on the fields.
